channel.description: Recent content in deterministic on Mathematical Michael

item.title: Regularization
item.description: .container{ max-width: 750px; } MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [ ['$','$'], ["\\(","\\)"] ], displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'], ["\\[","\\]"] ], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true }, // Center justify equations in code and markdown cells. Elsewhere // we use CSS to left justify single line equations in code cells. displayAlign: 'center', "HTML-CSS": { styles: {'.MathJax_Display': {"margin": 0}}, linebreaks: { automatic: true } } }); .cell.nbinteract-left { width: 50%; float: left; } .

item.title: Daily Ye
item.description: This project is a work in progress. Mostly I am in need of help sorting through lyrics and removing contributions from collaborators, which Mr. West has many of.

item.title: Moving Pictures
item.description: Please watch this space in the coming weeks. I am reviving an old project that I have presented at a few conferences as an undergraduate. This work kickstarted (well, more like it really developed) my deep love for coding. I am now transcribing work into Python to get away from the limitations of Matlab’s licensing structure. It is a lengthy process. Please be patient.
